question: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
true_answer: Because it has a very high rainfall.
asked_question_translated: なぜインドネシアのコタ・ボゴールは「雨の街」として知られているのか？
answer: コタ・ボゴールは年間を通して降雨量が非常に多いため、「雨の街」として知られています。
answer_translated_eng: Kota Bogor is known as the 'Rainy City' due to its very high rainfall throughout the year.
